thread.title_full: Fergie flaunts derriere in this racy photo - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Fergie flaunts derriere in this racy photo - Entertainment
text:
Fergie 
Mumbai: Singer Fergie flaunted her pert bottoms in a photograph she shared on social media platforms.
The 41-year-old shared the racy black and white images on Instagram.
In the photograph, the singer posed in a high-cut tight PVC body suit with her back facing the camera, highlighting her bottom.
She was wearing thigh-high skintight wet-look leggings and high-heel ankle boots. The image seemed to be taken in a studio. It's unclear what she was filming as Fergie only captioned the photograph with two film clapperboards.
  ð¬ð¬ 
A post shared by Fergie (@fergie) onFeb 20, 2017 at 10:41pm PST
 
Fergie is gearing up to release her second studio album "Double Duchess", which is yet to get an exact release date. The new LP was preceded by the singles "M.I.L.F. $" and "Life Goes On".
